statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ProductID , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name
FROM dbo.TProductItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ProductID = #ProductID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TProductItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TProductItem ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ProductID, Option1Type, Option1Name, Option2Type, Option2Name ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ProductID#, #Option1Type#, #Option1Name#, #Option2Type#, #Option2Name# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TProductItem SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ProductID = #ProductID# , Option1Type = #Option1Type# , Option1Name = #Option1Name# , Option2Type = #Option2Type# , Option2Name = #Option2Name# WHERE ID = #ID#
